activities.activity: Load Tests - Creating load tests with Gatling writing and running specifics scenarios.
CI/CD - Working with gitlab pipelines using Ansible, Docker, Nginx making differents and specifics stages to tests, build docker image and deploy(ansible and k8s).

Kubernets - Using Helm to manage .yaml files to make connections with Rancher and deploy apps on Clusters creating deployments, persistent volumes, persistent volumes claim, services, ingresses and pods with specifics configs: namespaces, replicaSet, livenessProbe, readnessProbe, rollingUpdate and resources limits.
ReactJS - Working with components, contexts, .tsx files, unit tests, Material UI, Clean Code and good pratices(SOLID / Principles of Functional Programming).
Google Maps Javascript API - Working with KML files, Custom Clustering and Custom Markers, Creating Styles for the Map.
Using Sonarqube to find smell codes and with Jest ensure test coverage to ensure a code clean and with good practices.
Observability - Analyze graphs identifying anomalies in the system and corrections of necessary resources with the help of tools such as Datadog & Grafana.
